control.onclick: RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mediatype=tvshow, silent=true, seasonposter, extrafanart, clearlogo, clearart, banner, seasonbanner, characterart, landscape)
RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mediatype=movie, silent=true, extrafanart, clearlogo, clearart, discart, banner, landscape)
RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mediatype=musicvideo, silent=true, extrafanart, clearlogo, clearart, discart, banner, landscape)
